data.title: Lazar Ristovski's girlfriend spoke for the first time about her relationship with the actor: We both love action and a fast pace

She knows how to often share their joint pictures on social networks, and among the latest ones are those from the Maldives, where they recently traveled. Lazar Ristovski's girlfriend spoke for the first time about the relationship with the actor: We both love action and a fast pace Read More »
data.text:
The actress Anica Lazic received a lot of media attention after it became known that she was in a relationship with the 39-year-old actor Lazar Ristovski. She knows how to often share their joint pictures on social networks, and among the latest ones are those from the Maldives, where they recently traveled.

As she said in the interview for "Hello", she spent the last seven months filming a new series, so Lazar suggested that they go on a short vacation. They soon decided on the Maldives, which she says they have not regretted.

"Lazar and I have a similar temperament and we like action and a fast pace, and we got used to the energy of the Maldives faster than we expected," Anica told "Hello".

The actress returned from this exotic trip full of impressions, and the beautiful beaches and friendly people delighted her.

"It is the place of the most beautiful sunsets." We don't know about the sunrise, because we overslept all of them," she said, and then added that they went barefoot everywhere: "We walked without shoes on the finest white sand."

This couple had the opportunity to meet many new people in the Maldives, but also to learn a lot from the local population.

"You can learn a lot from the Maldivians about nature and its preservation, about the attitude towards the animals that live there, about hospitality and the warmth with which they treat every guest. "Maldives live in the present moment, without stress or hurry," concluded the actress.

Let's remind you that Lazar has one marriage behind him, and that was with his colleague Danica Ristovski, and now many were interested in whether he would take her to the altar and Anica, who, as she says herself, marriage is not her priority.
